creator: dhc4z@virginia.edu
text:
It seems that the publication created should have a copy of the contents
directory  of the template publication when one uses the
createPublicationFromTemplate usecase.

creator: dhc4z@virginia.edu
text:
Created attachment 15179
copies the contents directory to the new pub

the way it is now, the newly created pub has a sitetree that references
documents that don't exist.  Only the authoring directories are created.
